name: Luxor Solitaire
description: The Gods have summoned you to the banks of the Nile. Solve Solitaire-Levels and use your skills to build the great city of Luxor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
